dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HJ 35 IH: Making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2015, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Rogers of Kentucky introduced the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Appropriations

form.official-title: Making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2015, and for other purposes.

section.text: That the Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2015 (Public Law 113â€“164) is further amended by striking the date specified in section 106(3) and inserting March 19, 2015.
